name: Fountain Partners
tag_list: financing, venture-capital, leasing, equipment-leasing, venture-leasing, venture-debt, debt, loans
overview:
Fountain Partners provides equipment lease lines of credit for venture and expansion stage companies.

Through its proprietary online qualification and pricing engine, Fountain Partners allows CFOs and CEOs the flexibility to customize a lease program to either maximize cash runway or minimize the total cost of financing their capex based on their own preferences. Warrants are not required and blanket liens are not required. Fountain complements existing bank credit and venture debt capital. High growth clients simply lease their depreciating assets giving their equity capital a chance to last longer and appreciate in value.

The finance business was founded by Tom Carter in 2006 to serve as the most time efficient and flexible source of equipment leasing for growing businesses.
